== Video Overview ==

Ubuntu consists of many component parts from the boot loader to the kernel, window manager and so on. This screencast provides a high level overview of each major component as seen from the initial boot up of a live environment to the desktop.

== Target Audience ==

* People unfamiliar with the Linux environment who wish to know more about what makes Linux tick.

== Pre-requisites ==

* None

== Required Knowledge ==

* Basic familiarity with PC.
 
== Recommended Knowledge ==

* None

== Objectives ==

* Describe (at a high level) the boot-up process
* Explain some of the major components in an Ubuntu system
